data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Imphal East to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Imphal East, Manipur, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Imphal East, Manipur, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 3,719 people in the county of Imphal East who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Imphal East, Manipur, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Thoubalkonou people.
Father, let the threatened of Imphal East, Manipur, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Imphal East. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Imphal East, Manipur, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

location.name: Imphal East
